title: Cozy 2 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom Apt for rent
posting_body: Property is under the Detroit HOME program.
As such, tenant must fall under specific income requirements that will be based on family size.
Does not include utilities and is subject to change as guidelines are adjusted by the city.
This 2 bedroom, 1 3/4 bath, upper unit features all appliances included, washer dryer hook ups in the unit, hardwood floors and newer finishes in every room.
Second bathroom has a stand up shower and is attached to the bedroom.
Balcony is a wonderful place to enjoy your morning coffee or watch the sun set.
